column5: I need to get a lifejacket for an infant (3 month old less than 20lbs). Does anyone have a suggestion? I was looking at getting a Naya one, but can't find anywhere that they are in stock.  Thanks for your help.
Are you near Vaughan?  http://www.ofncommun...showtopic=46013  Might be a little big now but a good price for future use.
